snippet: The diplomat tasked with ending Syria’s civil war said Thursday that the conflict was worsening, after traveling to the country for the first time since taking a job he has called “nearly impossible.”
abstract: United Nations-Arab League envoy Lakhdar Brahimi, tasked with ending Syria's civil war, says conflict is worsening and ending it will be 'nearly impossible.'
lead_paragraph: The diplomat tasked with ending Syria’s civil war said Thursday that the conflict was worsening, after traveling to the country for the first time since taking a job he has called “nearly impossible.”

headline.main: Syria: Envoy Says Crisis Is Worsening
headline.print_headline: Syria: Envoy Says Crisis Is Worsening
